component.name: Supercollider
component.summary: A platform for audio synthesis and algorithmic composition, used by musicians, artists and researchers working with sound.

description.p: scsynth – A real-time audio server sclang – An interpreted programming language scide – An editor for sclang with an integrated help system

SuperCollider was developed by James McCartney and originally released in 1996. In 2002, he generously released it as free software under the GNU General Public License. It is now maintained and developed by an active and enthusiastic community.
